weka.gui.streams

Class InstanceViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • weka.gui.streams.InstanceViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, InstanceListener

    public class InstanceViewer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements InstanceListener
    This is a very simple instance viewer - just displays the dataset as text output as it would be written to a file. A more complex viewer might be more spreadsheet-like
    Version:
    $Revision: 7059 $
    Author:
    Len Trigg (trigg@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
